attributes.action: Petition to bring f1 race to london streets on grounds that it will be ....AWESOME
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to acknowledge that the Formula 1 street track in London will be a great idea.. As FORMULA 1 is a growing sport...
It will bring business and tourism to England, there are many people in england who would love this to happen it is a great business venture, money maker and crowd pleaser
